content:
Part-time employees at a small business get paid hourly wages based on how many years  they have worked at the business.
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Years worked** | $0$ | $1$ | $2$ | $3$ | $4$
**Hourly wage** | $\$5.50$ | $\$6.50$ | $\$7.00$ | $\$7.50$ | $\$7.50$
